snippet: Chelsea played in white in a 1-0 win at Crystal Palace on Saturday but it is a coat of many colours that self-styled tailor Antonio Conte has cut into a table-topping outfit.    Conte has transformed a team with only two new players, Marcos Alonso...

headline.main: Conte Not Tinker but Tailor in Chelsea Win Streak
headline.print_headline: Conte Not Tinker but Tailor in Chelsea Win Streak

lead_paragraph: Chelsea played in white in a 1-0 win at Crystal Palace on Saturday but it is a coat of many colours that self-styled tailor Antonio Conte has cut into a table-topping outfit.    Conte has transformed a team with only two new players, Marcos Alonso and N'Golo Kante, from last season’s struggling side who finished 10th in the standings.

snippet: It's one game, with about $250 million riding on it....

snippet: Newcastle United striker Aleksandar Mitrovic will be out of action for a couple of weeks after picking up a knee ligament injury, manager Steve McClaren has said....

headline.main: Newcastle's Mitrovic Sidelined by Minor Knee Injury
headline.print_headline: Newcastle's Mitrovic Sidelined by Minor Knee Injury

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United striker Aleksandar Mitrovic will be out of action for a couple of weeks after picking up a knee ligament injury, manager Steve McClaren has said.

snippet: The Football Association will investigate reports of crowd trouble among West Ham United supporters at Saturday's Premier League game against Watford....

headline.main: FA Will Investigate West Ham Crowd Trouble
headline.print_headline: FA Will Investigate West Ham Crowd Trouble

lead_paragraph: The Football Association will investigate reports of crowd trouble among West Ham United supporters at Saturday's Premier League game against Watford.

snippet: Chelsea long-serving captain John Terry has been ruled out for around 10 days with strained ligaments in his foot and will miss Friday's Premier League clash with Liverpool, the London club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Chelsea's Terry to Miss Liverpool Clash
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Terry to Miss Liverpool Clash

lead_paragraph: Chelsea long-serving captain John Terry has been ruled out for around 10 days with strained ligaments in his foot and will miss Friday's Premier League clash with Liverpool, the London club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Everton ended a disappointing season with a convincing 3-0 Premier League victory over relegated Norwich City at Goodison Park on Sunday....

headline.main: Everton End Poor Season in Style
headline.print_headline: Everton End Poor Season in Style

lead_paragraph: Everton ended a disappointing season with a convincing 3-0 Premier League victory over relegated Norwich City at Goodison Park on Sunday.

snippet: City ended a poor recent run with a clinical 3-1 victory at Bournemouth in the Premier League on Saturday....

snippet: Striker Juanmi has joined La Liga club Real Sociedad from Southampton for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League side said on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Striker Juanmi has joined La Liga club Real Sociedad from Southampton for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League side said on Thursday.

snippet: Stoke City must carry the momentum from a convincing 2-0 win over Burnley into a tough run of games, defender Marc Muniesa said....
